item.title: How Does Convolution Work?
item.description: Convolutional neural networks have had breakthrough success in image recognition, natural language processing, and even board games like Chess and Go. But what’s really going on during convolution? Well, I think the easiest way to explain is with an interactive demo. Feel free to play around with the parameters below to see for yourself! number: four three eight padding: kernel size: stride: speed: You can use the settings above to control the hyperparameters of the convolutional layer.
